docs.lead_paragraph: An amendment redefining “personhood” was soundly rejected largely on fears that hinged on aspects of reproductive science other than abortion.

headline.seo: ‘No’ Vote in Mississippi Hinged on Issues Beyond Abortion
headline.main: Medical Nuances Drove ‘No’ Vote in Mississippi
headline.print_headline: Medical Nuances Drove ‘No’ Vote in Mississippi

docs.abstract: Many voters in Mississippi rejected anti-abortion amendment because of concerns that the definition of ‘personhood’ may have curtailed access to in vitro fertilization and birth control, or limited treatment for high-risk pregnancies.
docs.snippet: An amendment redefining “personhood” was soundly rejected largely on fears that hinged on aspects of reproductive science other than abortion.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bright-light therapy is the treatment of choice for many Americans who suffer the winter blues, but many experts say it is underused.

headline.seo: Light Boxes May Help Melt Those Winter Blues
headline.main: A Portable Glow to Help Melt Those Winter Blues
headline.print_headline: A Portable Glow to Help Melt Those Winter Blues

docs.abstract: Roni Caryn Rabin The Consumer column suggests those who suffer from seasonal depression, known as Seasonal Affective Disorder, should try bright-light therapy, treatment that many doctors say is underused.
docs.snippet: Bright-light therapy is the treatment of choice for many Americans who suffer the winter blues, but many experts say it is underused.
